thing-type.label: Haas+Sohn Oven
thing-type.description: The binding for Haas and Sohn Pelletstove communicates with a Haas and Sohn Pelletstove through the optional WLAN-Modul. More information can be found here: https://www.haassohn.com/de/ihr-plus/WLAN-Funktion. It allows to power on/off the stove as well as receiving different operation information about the stove.

parameter.name: hostIP
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: Please add the IP Address of the WIFI Module of the Haas and Sohn oven here

parameter.name: hostPIN
parameter.label: PIN
parameter.description: Please add the PIN of your oven here. You can find it in the Menu directly in your oven.

parameter.name: refreshRate
parameter.label: Refresh Rate
parameter.description: How often the Pellet Stove should schedule a refresh after a channel is linked to an item. Temperature data will be refreshed according this set time in seconds. Valid input is 0 - 999.

channel-type.label: Is Temperature Stove
channel-type.description: Receives the is temperature of the stove as number:temperature

channel-type.label: Mode Stove
channel-type.description: Receives the actual mode of the stove as string

channel-type.label: Set Temperature Stove
channel-type.description: Set the target temperature of the stove as number:temperature

channel-type.label: On/Off Stove
channel-type.description: To turn the stove on/off as switch

channel-type.label: On/Off Eco Mode
channel-type.description: To turn the Eco Mode on/off for the stove as switch

channel-type.label: Ignitions Stove
channel-type.description: Receives the total amount of ignitions of the stove as string

channel-type.label: Next Maintenance
channel-type.description: Provides a pellet forecast when the stove need to be maintained next in kilogram as number:mass

channel-type.label: Next Cleaning Window
channel-type.description: Provides a time forecast in hours:minutes when the stove need to be cleaned next as String

channel-type.label: Total Consumption Stove
channel-type.description: Provides the information about the total consumption of pellets of the stove as number:mass

channel-type.label: Operation Hours Stove
channel-type.description: Provides the information of the operating hours of stove as number
